original_text: Then the king commanded Ashpenaz, his chief eunuch, to bring some of the people of Israel, both of the royal family and of the nobility,
korean_text: 왕이 환관장 아스부나스에게 말하여 이스라엘 자손 중에서 왕족과 귀족 몇 사람

sentences.original_text: to bring some of the people of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 중 몇 사람을 데려오라고,

sentences.original_text: both of the royal family and of the nobility,
